text: læa rea di kahnd shay wi sahrab phwk khea læw phwk khea k thahı sing thi xyu khang hna khxng phwk khea læa sing thi xyu beuxnghlang khxng phwk khea hı pen thi lumhlng kæ phwk khea dangnan phra prakasit (kar lngthosʹ) kæ prachachati tang «khxng phwk yin læa mnusʹy thi di lwnglab pi kxn hna phwk khea nan k penkar sasm kæ phwk khea læw thæcring phwk khea pen phu khadthun
